feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add back global-error.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18692
  • fix: revert app error pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18696
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18699
  • fix: Revert - chore: app router - all sub-pages in /apps #16976 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18702

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.19...v4.9.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Booking atom phone booking field and booking fields order by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18678
  • fix: v2 booking guests by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18690
  • feat: Allow non-calcom domains to run team slug pages by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18711
  • fix: add decoding logic to app router params by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18712
  • feat: Salesforce - map booking questions to event record by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18532

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.0...v4.9.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Revert - "revert app error pages #18696" PR by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18714
  • perf: Move CRM event creation to tasker by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18370
  • fix: resize app-store images to use less bytes by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18675
  • fix: Booking with the same email when using capital letters by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18694
  • fix: filters ui breaking on mobile in routing insights page by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18713
  • feat: Salesforce - write to field without validation by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18722
  • fix: edit webhook time by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18549
  • chore: clean up <HeadSeo> components where not needed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18731
  • chore: migrate /auth/error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18730
  • chore: migrate /auth/new by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18732
  • fix: duplicating an event turns private link on by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18727
  • fix: Getting an error with managed events when accessing through api/v1 by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18683
  • fix: Impersonation issue from userstable by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18608
  • fix: potential org slug fix by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18718
  • chore: Bump Dub version to fix createMany error by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18591
  • chore: technical debt clearing - remove getServerSideProps for /event-types by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18733
  • feat: Use dub.customer.list to issue dual-sided incentives by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.1...v4.9.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: adjust table height for a few rows on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18728
  • fix: small spacing fix in app router 404 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18741
  • feat: auto lock by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18630
  • chore: bump libphonenumber-js version to 1.11.18 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18757
  • chore: tech debt clearing - simplify isThemeSupported usage by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18746
  • fix: Parse JSON metadata better and stop crash from API V1 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18756
  • fix: ensure platform managed user has 1 schedule by default by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18719
  • fix: nested scrolls on /bookings/upcoming by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18760
  • feat: HitPay Payment App by @MuhammadAimanSulaiman in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17213
  • fix: Disable custom templates for trialing teams by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18748
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18764
  • chore: Add more logging around getUserAvailability by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18769

New Contributors

  • @MuhammadAimanSulaiman made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17213

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.2...v4.9.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Use Cloudflare Turnstile in booker by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18755
  • feat: add transcription as attachment by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18740
  • fix: routing form list overflow by @MehulZR in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18686
  • chore: migrate low-risk 3 /auth pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18753
  • chore: Remove Chromatic GitHub workflow by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18780
  • fix: handle cancelation reason when user is host by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18681
  • chore: Double available memory on api/book/event by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18790
  • fix: Initialize Hubspot client in CRMService by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18789
  • fix: custom templates on team plan by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18792

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.3...v4.9.4
